summary: REQ-1 appears implemented for the portfolio holdings list/table: HoldingsTable now filters holdings using a case-insensitive helper (lowercased/trimmed includes match) without changing ticker display casing. No evidence of other holdings-filtering UIs being updated in the provided diff summary. There are additional unrequested changes (new generic search utility and project/meta files updates).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a generic text-search utility module (normalizeText/matchesQuery) rather than implementing case-insensitive matching inline where needed.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to make holdings filtering case-insensitive; it does not request creating new shared utility modules.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added repository meta/documentation/state files (frontend file summaries and project_state).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project tracking or summary files; these are not required to implement case-insensitive holdings filtering.
